General.Name: Red Avenue New Materials Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Red Avenue New Materials Group Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells chemical materials in China and internationally. The company offers tackifying resins, phenol-formaldehyde reinforcing products, adhesive resins, leveling agents, vulcanized resins, tread resins, electronic phenolics, liquid phenolic resin, powder resins, and additives; and rubber and plastic processing aids, accelerators, microelectronic materials, degradable plastics, etc. It also distributes various chemical products. The company was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.

1.Name: Mr. Yaoming  Yu
1.Title: Director & VP and Financial Controller , CFO
